panels.title: Top 10 JOBIDs by Read + Write OPS

targets.expr: topk(10, sum(vnfs_OPEN_COUNT + vnfs_CLOSE_COUNT + vnfs_GETATTR_COUNT + vnfs_SETATTR_COUNT + vnfs_READDIR_COUNT + vnfs_CREATE_COUNT + vnfs_LINK_COUNT + vnfs_UNLINK_COUNT + vnfs_SYMLINK_COUNT + vnfs_LOOKUP_COUNT + vnfs_RENAME_COUNT + vnfs_ACCESS_COUNT + vnfs_LISTXATTR_COUNT + vnfs_MKDIR_COUNT + vnfs_RMDIR_COUNT + vnfs_FLUSH_COUNT + vnfs_FSYNC_COUNT + vnfs_LOCK_COUNT + vnfs_MMAP_COUNT) by (JOBID))
topk(10, (sum(vnfs_READ_COUNT) by (JOBID) / sum(vnfs_READ_DURATION) by (JOBID)) + (sum(vnfs_WRITE_COUNT) by (JOBID) / sum(vnfs_WRITE_DURATION) by (JOBID)))

panels.title: Top 10 JOBIDs by Read + Write BW

targets.expr: sum(vnfs_GETATTR_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_READDIR_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_LOOKUP_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_ACCESS_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_LISTXATTR_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_MMAP_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"}) by (JOBID)

sum(vnfs_OPEN_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_CLOSE_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_SETATTR_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_CREATE_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_LINK_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_UNLINK_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_SYMLINK_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_RENAME_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_MKDIR_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_RMDIR_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_FLUSH_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_FSYNC_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_LOCK_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_MMAP_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"}) by (JOBID)

sum(vnfs_GETATTR_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_READDIR_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_LOOKUP_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_ACCESS_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_LISTXATTR_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_MMAP_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"}) by (MOUNT)

sum(vnfs_GETATTR_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_READDIR_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_LOOKUP_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_ACCESS_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_LISTXATTR_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_MMAP_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"}) by (REMOTE_PATH)

panels.title: Read Metadata OPS per Remote Path

targets.expr: sum(vnfs_OPEN_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_CLOSE_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_SETATTR_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_CREATE_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_LINK_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_UNLINK_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_SYMLINK_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_RENAME_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_MKDIR_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_RMDIR_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_FLUSH_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_FSYNC_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_LOCK_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"} + vnfs_MMAP_COUNT{JOBID=~"$jobid"}) by (REMOTE_PATH)
